```{r setup, include=FALSE}

# Attach packages
```

```{r}
ucsb_grad <- read_csv(here("data", "ucsb_grad_data.csv")) # read in data
```

```{r}
ggplot(ucsb_grad, aes(x = year_abbr, y = domestic_enrollment, fill = ethnicity)) +
  geom_col() #geom _column
```
